title: Kled's VO!

embed.description: This is the voice for the new Updated Kled in English. For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/ Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights

body:
He's as crazy as you'd expect!

He actually fucking swears too!

replies.body: Seven minutes in and I feel sorry for the VA's voice-box.

That's it.
I'm done.

He fucking swears like my sailor grandad.
And his constant yelling makes him hillarious.

Interesting, a mix of stuff.  A decorated soldier, an old "get off my lawn" type, southern separatists, anti-intellectual, drug addict, and delusional.

Also, noticed more swears than I've ever heard from a champ.  I don't personally mind, just a bit surprising.

Also he apparently has a relative yordle, any guess who it might be?
As crazy as he is {{champion:115}}?

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Dienekes,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8EVMNVRF,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-07-25T20:12:14.363+0000)
>
> Also he apparently has a relative yordle, any guess who it might be?

Of course he does... Kled IS a yordle.

Its like saying that Janna has a relative human.

Alright thank you mister pedantic. His dialogue makes it seem he is related to a different yordle champion. Or possibly his use of cousin was meant to be an informal greeting for all yordles, we'll find out.
"Holy s*** Where are" made me lose my fucking mind

EDIT: OK ARE WE GONNA HEAR *bleep* INGAME ASWELL?
Or is that gunna be the uncensored version?

The line was designed to be bleeped. I suggested trying the line with a bleep in the script.  We tried it . It was funnier with the bleep.  So we put it in.

Yay post-modernism!
what causes him to say it? ults that don't hit anyone maybe?

I believe that one is one of the lines the bucket for "first move."   So it will only happen when you are clicking a move command while in the fountain.  (But it has a very high % of triggering when those conditions are met)
You should make it so that whenever he teleports (Tahm Ult, Ryze Ult) he says that line. I think it'll be pretty funny.
Can confirm, the bleep is way funnier.
As far as I'm aware the bleep's in game too.

Poor voice actor, imagine how much that poor man has been screaming...
It'd be atleast 22 minutes of screaming, but he propably had to re-do a bunch of lines when they weren't gud enough, and he might've done some lines that didn't actually make it....
It was probably hours of work. I praise that man for having the throat strength to do yordle screaming so well.
REDNECK YORDLE
Going to be tougher to report players when some of the toxic behaviour is from the in-game champ himself...

Ok, I wasn't sure at first, but his VO sold me on it. 

I am gushing with Noxian Pride right now.
This better have a Veigar quote.

> [{quoted}](name=Marbelara,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=8EVMNVRF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-25T19:55:46.225+0000)
>
> This better have a Veigar quote.

Just checked, i dont think so which is extremely stupid and disappointing.

Eh, I'm conflicted.  He's got some good lines, but it's sorta got that Borderlands issue of "SCREAMING MAKES EVERYTHING FUNNY RIGHT AHHHHHHHHHHHHH MEMES RIGHT?" that I thought we all got over like, 5 years ago. 

I actually think his funniest lines are the ones where he just goes totally deadpan.  Him slowly pondering the nature of Cassiopeia made me laugh.
To be fair, most of his lines span the gamut of quiet and contemplative to loud and rabid. I am willing to bet most of his screaming is heard in actual combat.
It's also worth noting that this is new for League as a whole; not many champions actively scream anything.
If only Kled were a support.....
Doesn't mean you can't play him as one...

Of course you can, but perhaps you missed my meaning.

A while back there was a post on the boards about an old Noxian Drill Sargent/General being a great concept for a support. Kled fits the personality and attitude of what I envisioned that character to be in my head perfectly. There is nothing wrong with off-meta supports (and to the guy who mentioned support Sion, I've done it and it's fun as hell), but as an actual support main  (yes we exist) I scrutinize champions very thoroughly on what they can actually bring to a team comp in my preferred role. 

What does Kled bring to the bot lane? A resounding meh, novelty and maybe a few cheeky roaming ganks once you hit 6 but not much else. You don't have the gold income as a support to build AD (which Kled scales off of) and your bonus health only applies to the mount. Without any form of hard crowd control in his kit he really just doesn't bring anything worth having as a support.

It's a fun idea, and it's cute, but it won't work. Don't let that stop you from messing around with it if you want, far be it from me to tell anyone what they can and cannot do, just don't expect much from it.
I see what you are saying man, no harm. And Sion Support is fun and much more viable than Kled support will ever be imo.
Amen to that dude
Sion is a fantastic support. I see no reason why someone with a better ult, more tank stats, a grab that passes minions, and %health damage wouldn't be ever better in support role.

Kled's base hp is only 340, meaning when he isn't mounted he will have a pretty low health pool when not mounted. This means that he will have moments of being very vulnerable to champs that can outpoke. Sion has a better poke and better base stats in general, but at least Kled is manaless.

Meaning his base HP is actually 680 until you damage him enough. Which goes for everyone. Sion only has 542 base HP, and if you damage him to half health, he only has 271. Seems like 271 is lower than 340 to me.

Sion actually has some of the lowest base stats around, in general. Even Zed has better base armor, armor growth, base health, and health growth than Sion does.

I think that is to off set the infinite scaling hp on W, and the fact that he is meant to build all of those stats. 

As for Kled, that doesn't change the fact that he won't always be mounted meaning that that is when you go in on him (think of how bad mini gnar's base stats are). Just an observation really.

My two favorite things in the League Universe: yordles and Noxus.
Bless Kled and Skaarl. I am in love.
Also wondering how many of the places/battles mentioned in his lines are new? I did not recognize some of them, though I was cooking and listening so it could just be I missed the recognition while I was busy.
**THIS IS NOXUS**
Sounds like Leblanc.
Kinda wish he didn't yell so much in plain voice lines.

"Kleeeed... Nah, its just Kled."

"Who wants some Kled?"

I just have to say. I'm from Arkansas and. This. Is. GLORIOUS.

No, seriously, this is now my favorite champ. Please, Riot, we need more Southern-voiced Champs, and Graves doesn't count. He's Western.
{{champion:223}}  is cajun (that's how he comes across)
Yea, but I come from Arkansas, not Louisiana. Louisianans are partially French, which gives them a different accent than we hillbillies.

Did he say 
the word 'fuck' in the VO?

"Would you stop bitching for one minute?"

Dafuq Rito... xD
It's a subliminal message to all players. lol
Which champs does he have a taunt for?

Illaoi, Teemo, Ashe, all Noxus champs... those are the ones I noticed.  The "You call yourself a god?" could be directed at Aurelion Sol (or maybe Bard).  There's a few general Ionia comments (doesn't seem specific to a champ).  The reload comment could be Jhin, Graves or both (Annie reloads her stun (passive) too, but prob not her).

"Klleeeedddd, no it's just Kled"
"This is where Kled shines."
The Draven ones are fun.

"I don't need a team to start a team fight."
Amen.  Love Kled already. lol
